author: ET Online
title: Why Premji will work from home after April 20
description: Why Premji will work from home after April 20Operations of IT and IT-enabled services will come under relaxation after April 20.
content:
As India approaches the 27th day of lockdown on April 20, the central government has decided to offer several relaxations to a few business.
On Saturday, Wipro Chairman Rishad Premji urged his over 11,000 Twitter followers to stay at home unless 'absolutely … [+4439 chars]
